evidence.claim: HealthCare Synergy employs Amazon Web Services (AWS) for its cloud infrastructure.
The company leverages FHIR standards for data exchange in health applications.
HealthCare Synergy utilizes HL7 for interoperability between health information systems.
The integration patterns include event-driven architecture to support real-time data processing.
HealthCare Synergy implements X12 for electronic data interchange in billing and claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Focuses on healthcare data exchange and uses X12 standards, indicating strong ICP alignment.
